rule: A model name is not defined as the official name given to a machine learning model as mentioned within the abstract text.
input: We use techniques such as data augmentation.
validityText:
The input provided does not constitute an abstract of a machine learning paper as it is only a single, brief sentence lacking the necessary depth and detail typically found in an abstract. An abstract usually includes a summary of the paper's objectives, methods, results, and conclusions, which are not present in this input.
